section.heading: Judicial review of mayoral actions.
section.text: Proceedings for judicial review of mayoral actions shall be subject to and be in accordance with the District of Columbia Administrative Procedure Act (§ 2-501 et seq.) applicable to “rule-making”; provided, however, that review of mayoral actions pursuant to § 42-1904.06 shall be subject to provisions applicable to “contested cases.”

annotations.annotation: Mar. 29, 1977, D.C. Law 1-89, title IV, § 416, 23 DCR 9532b
